doc.title: 2 Scoops of Justice
doc.plot: It is the exciting adventure of Zach and Joonki. Two boys whose overactive imaginations have run amok as they play superheroes. Zach enters his room to play Superman just to have Joonki try to ruin it. Just when you think all the fun is over Zach blasts through his ceiling and Joonki transforms into 'THE PINK LANTERN'. The boys have a spectacular fight in a major city and just when you think Zach and Joonki will smash each other to bits, Zach's mother ruins all the fun but not before Zach gets his revenge.
